description: Identifies the creation of local users via the net.exe command.
author: Endgame
JHasenbusch (adapted to Sigma for oscd.community)
false_positives: Better use event IDs for user creation rather than command line rules.
name: New User Created Via Net.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*user*" AND process.command_line.text:"*add*"))
